member.name: T:Windows.System.Profile.SystemManufacturers.OemSupportInfo
member.summary: Provides support information about the manufacturer of the device. This includes the OEM’s name, web site address, and other support details.

member.name: P:Windows.System.Profile.SystemManufacturers.OemSupportInfo.SupportAppLink
member.summary: Gets the protocol handler link to the OEM-built support app that will be launched instead of the web URL.
member.returns: The protocol handler link to the OEM-built support app.

member.name: P:Windows.System.Profile.SystemManufacturers.OemSupportInfo.SupportLink
member.summary: Gets the Uniform Resource Identifier (URI) for the Original Equipment Manufacturer (OEM) support web site.
member.returns: The URI for the OEM support web site.

member.name: P:Windows.System.Profile.SystemManufacturers.OemSupportInfo.SupportProvider
member.summary: Gets the name of the support provider for the device.
member.returns: The name of the support provider for the device.

member.name: T:Windows.System.Profile.SystemManufacturers.SmbiosInformation
member.summary: Enables access to properties from the SMBIOS for the system.

member.name: P:Windows.System.Profile.SystemManufacturers.SmbiosInformation.SerialNumber
member.summary: Gets the serial number from the SMBIOS for the system.

member.name: T:Windows.System.Profile.SystemManufacturers.SystemSupportDeviceInfo
member.summary: Provides the app with the ability to retrieve device information from the local device.

member.name: P:Windows.System.Profile.SystemManufacturers.SystemSupportDeviceInfo.FriendlyName
member.summary: Gets the friendly name of the local device. This value might come from a NetBIOS computer name.
member.returns: The friendly name of the local device. The value is fewer than 1024 characters long.

member.name: P:Windows.System.Profile.SystemManufacturers.SystemSupportDeviceInfo.OperatingSystem
member.summary: Gets the name of the operating system of the local device.
member.returns: A string containing the operating system of the local device.

member.name: P:Windows.System.Profile.SystemManufacturers.SystemSupportDeviceInfo.SystemFirmwareVersion
member.summary: Gets the system firmware version of the local device.
member.returns: A string containing the system firmware version of the local device.

member.name: P:Windows.System.Profile.SystemManufacturers.SystemSupportDeviceInfo.SystemHardwareVersion
member.summary: Gets the system hardware version of the local device.
member.returns: A string containing the system hardware version of the local device.

member.name: P:Windows.System.Profile.SystemManufacturers.SystemSupportDeviceInfo.SystemManufacturer
member.summary: Gets the system manufacturer of the local device. Use **SystemManufacturer** only if the value of SystemSku is empty.
member.returns: A string containing the system manufacturer of the local device. The value is fewer than 1024 characters long.

member.name: P:Windows.System.Profile.SystemManufacturers.SystemSupportDeviceInfo.SystemProductName
member.summary: Gets the system product name of the local device. Use **SystemProductName** only if the value of SystemSku is empty.
member.returns: A string containing the system product name of the local device. The value is fewer than 1024 characters long.

member.name: P:Windows.System.Profile.SystemManufacturers.SystemSupportDeviceInfo.SystemSku
member.summary: Gets the system SKU of the local device.
member.returns: A string containing the system SKU of the local device.

member.name: T:Windows.System.Profile.SystemManufacturers.SystemSupportInfo
member.summary: Provides support information about the device. This includes the local system edition, and OEM support information.

member.name: P:Windows.System.Profile.SystemManufacturers.SystemSupportInfo.LocalDeviceInfo
member.returns: A SystemSupportDeviceInfo value representing the local device.

member.name: P:Windows.System.Profile.SystemManufacturers.SystemSupportInfo.LocalSystemEdition
member.summary: Gets the local system edition of the device.
member.returns: A string containing the local system edition of the device.

member.name: P:Windows.System.Profile.SystemManufacturers.SystemSupportInfo.OemSupportInfo
member.summary: Gets the OEM support information for the system.
member.returns: The OEM support info for the system.
